PAPIER-MACHE STAR SET

A starry set of hangings makes a perfect pick to add to plush interiors of your taste. The hangings take the shape of stars of varying sizes and use a material of mashed and hardened waste paper. The paper is then painted over by master artisans of the vale who craft elegies in Papier-Mache to beautify your home.

Material:
    Paper pulp, Papier-Mache.
Care:
    Dust it with a soft cotton cloth to keep away the dirt.
Usage:
    Unique gift Item, Home decor.
Shipping Info:
    Dispatched in a maximum of 6 business days

PAPIER-MACHE HANGING BELLS.
